capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: The role requires strong communication skills to develop and implement education programs and to engage with internal and external stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with internal and external suppliers is essential for the development and implementation of education and tour programs.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Planning and prioritising are necessary to effectively develop and implement innovative education programs.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: The role requires problem-solving skills to continuously improve programs through data analysis and stakeholder engagement.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Accountability is needed to ensure the programs achieve sustainable visitation and increased knowledge of NPWS' assets.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Self-management is important for continuously improving programs and adapting to changing needs.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respecting diverse backgrounds is crucial in promoting environmental awareness and cultural and historic heritage.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Skilled use of digital technologies is required for the development of engaging learning experiences.

skills.name: Program Development
skills.description: Supporting the development of engaging learning experiences across schools and visitors.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with internal and external suppliers to achieve program goals.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.description: Using data analysis to continuously improve education programs.

skills.name: Digital Technologies
skills.description: Utilizing digital technologies in the development of education programs.

generalRole.title: Environmental Education Program Coordinator
generalRole.description: This role involves the development and implementation of educational programs focused on environmental awareness, cultural, and historic heritage within national parks. It requires a blend of technical skills in program development and digital technologies, alongside soft skills such as communication and collaboration.
